name: The Gaia Directive
description:
The Gaia Directive is a surreal first-person explorative audiovisual experience that combines early CGI with 70s scifi aesthetics and trascendental elements.

Initally created during AGBIC 2017.

Instructions:

Find and activate the 3 generators. Watch the world change.
Headphones recommended.

Controls:

  • Keyboard/Mouse
    • WASD/Mouse - Walk/Look
    • Shift - Run
    • F - Toggle light/switch modes
    • Space - Navigation
    • Esc - Quit
  • Gamepad (Default configuration for XBOX gamepads on Windows)
    • L/R stick - Move/Look
    • L/R trigger - Run
    • Y - Toggle light/switch modes
    • A - Navigation
